pins.label: Digital 0 / RX
pins.description: Digital I/O pin. Also used as Serial RX (receive) for UART communication.

pins.label: Digital 1 / TX
pins.description: Digital I/O pin. Also used as Serial TX (transmit) for UART communication.

pins.label: Digital 2
pins.description: Digital I/O pin. Supports external interrupt (INT0).

pins.label: Digital 3 ~
pins.description: Digital I/O pin with PWM output. Supports external interrupt (INT1).

pins.label: Digital 4
pins.description: Digital I/O pin.

pins.label: Digital 5 ~
pins.description: Digital I/O pin with PWM output.

pins.label: Digital 6 ~
pins.description: Digital I/O pin with PWM output.

pins.label: Digital 7
pins.description: Digital I/O pin.

pins.label: Digital 8
pins.description: Digital I/O pin.

pins.label: Digital 9 ~
pins.description: Digital I/O pin with PWM output.

pins.label: Digital 10 ~ / SS
pins.description: Digital I/O pin with PWM output. SPI Slave Select (SS).

pins.label: Digital 11 ~ / MOSI
pins.description: Digital I/O pin with PWM output. SPI MOSI (Master Out Slave In).

pins.label: Digital 12 / MISO
pins.description: Digital I/O pin. SPI MISO (Master In Slave Out).

pins.label: Digital 13 / SCK / LED
pins.description: Digital I/O pin. SPI SCK (Serial Clock). Connected to built-in LED.

pins.label: Analog 0
pins.description: Analog input pin. 10-bit ADC, reads values 0-1023.

pins.label: Analog 1
pins.description: Analog input pin. 10-bit ADC, reads values 0-1023.

pins.label: Analog 2
pins.description: Analog input pin. 10-bit ADC, reads values 0-1023.

pins.label: Analog 3
pins.description: Analog input pin. 10-bit ADC, reads values 0-1023.

pins.label: Analog 4 / SDA
pins.description: Analog input pin. Also I2C SDA (data line).

pins.label: Analog 5 / SCL
pins.description: Analog input pin. Also I2C SCL (clock line).

pins.label: 5V
pins.description: 5V regulated power output. Can supply up to 500mA.

pins.label: 3.3V
pins.description: 3.3V regulated power output. Max 50mA current.

pins.label: VIN
pins.description: Input voltage pin. Use when powering board via external supply (7-12V recommended).

pins.label: GND
pins.description: Ground pin.

pins.label: GND
pins.description: Ground pin.

pins.label: GND
pins.description: Ground pin (near power pins).

pins.label: RESET
pins.description: Reset pin. Pull LOW to reset the microcontroller.

pins.label: IOREF
pins.description: I/O reference voltage. Reflects the operating voltage of the microcontroller (5V).

pins.label: AREF
pins.description: Analog reference voltage. Can be used to set external reference for ADC.
